INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 433, 292, 449]]<|/det|>
- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 761, 465]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 466, 808, 481]]<|/det|>
- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 482, 565, 497]]<|/det|>
- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 482, 512]]<|/det|>
- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 514, 362, 528]]<|/det|>
- Do not write on any bar codes.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 529, 482, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 335, 560]]<|/det|>
- You may use tracing paper.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 562, 466, 577]]<|/det|>
- You must show all necessary working clearly.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 666, 608]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 609, 482, 623]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 74, 325, 91]]<|/det|>
1 (a) Anvi buys a new car.

<|ref|>question_part<|/ref|><|det|>[[400, 400, 400, 400]]<|/det|>
(i)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[157, 103, 438, 138]]<|/det|>
(i) The price of the car is \(\$ 28\) 240 . She is given a \(7.5 \%\) discount.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[196, 152, 438, 167]]<|/det|>
Calculate the amount she pays.

<|ref|>question_part<|/ref|><|det|>[[400, 400, 400, 400]]<|/det|>
(ii)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[152, 290, 642, 323]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[196, 338, 603, 354]]<|/det|>
Calculate the capacity of the fuel tank in her old car.

<|ref|>question_part<|/ref|><|det|>[[200, 200, 200, 200]]<|/det|>
(b)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 505, 474, 551]]<|/det|>
(b) Aadi buys a new car costing \(\$ 28000\). He pays for the car using a finance plan. The finance plan is

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[156, 567, 269, 614]]<|/det|>
- a deposit
- 47 equal monthly payments of \(\$ 330\)
- a final payment of \(\$ 11490\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[157, 628, 653, 645]]<|/det|>
Using this finance plan, Aadi pays a total of \(\$ 31900\) for the car.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[157, 659, 576, 676]]<|/det|>
Calculate the deposit paid as a percentage of \(\$ 28000\).

(c)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 74, 518, 107]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[157, 121, 457, 153]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>form<|/ref|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[157, 352, 535, 368]]<|/det|>
